title: The Urge
content:
The Urge Type Companion Quest

The Urge is a Companion Quest in Baldur's Gate 3. The Urge can be acquired from Dark Urge origin characters. The Dark Urge Page is also another source of information about the Dark Urge

The Urge Objectives

Be yourself! Think dirty thoughts!

You really can't help it, can you? These vile things you do... Don't you wonder why you're doing them? You must really have been an awful person before the crash... Perhaps it's better that you forgot about it. But you want t
